Negative_Review: The room had a couple of little issues including a light bulb that was out and the toilet roll holder was coming off the wall but nothing bad just a little need for attention to detail
Positive_Review: The location was great and the rooms comfy the concierge was amazing nothing was too much trouble staff on reception were nice but never smiled lol The price of the room on Booking com was a third of the advertised price in the hotel

Negative_Review: The room is not as expected the photos in Booking com app showing very beautiful and well decorated rooms The room they gave me was not even close to the photos and was very old That is the only thing I didn t like
Positive_Review: I liked the location behind Hugo Boss Champs elysees Branch the staff cleanliness of the hotel

Negative_Review: A little dated The air conditioning unit is a floor standing supplementary unit Very effective but noisy Check out was over bureaucratic and lengthy
Positive_Review: Location price functional comfortable room

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We always stay at this hotel when in Paris it is friendly and has in our opinion a very good location It has a very pleasant lounge and a good lift

Negative_Review: Break fast is typical French style and too standard I was expecting to see more dishes
Positive_Review: Good place to stay The best point is where the hotel is In 3mn s you can get down to Champs Elysees This is very good

Negative_Review: The room was supposed to be superior class There were however clear signs of water damage on the walls and ceiling Maybe mould as well The lower part of the entrance door was damaged of water The internet was no less than terrible Could almost not open google and impossible to read the news not to mention getting or sending mail Terrible This including the lobby and breakfast rooms The breakfast was very simple One of the staff a bell boy stated that taxi was faster than the train to CDG Airport Well it s not Not at 5pm on a Tuesday It took more than two hours and we only made the flight because it was delayed 45min
Positive_Review: Very good location just one block from Champs lys es in the vicinity of Arc de Triumph The hotel could be very good with just minor maintenance Very friendly staff apart from one guy who was irritatingly friendly and gave wrong info See below

Negative_Review: furniture to be renewed no kettle in the room
Positive_Review: Perfect location just steps to Champs Elys es Room space is ok staff was very friendly near to all kind of shops restaurants grocery

Negative_Review: Basically we have to acknowledge it s Paris and near Champs Elys es expesinve limited in space and public parking available only We did not expet more from Hotel But Paris as a trouristic destination should offer at least cheap tickets for public transportation and special rates for parking nearby the hotel Furthermore I expected the French chefs would have a bit more pride the food in the majority of the restaurants are below expected standards without passion However France is great and Paris a must of course e g museum sight seeing There are also some good restaurants if you are willing not to worry too much about the budget The only item I would critisize about the hotel is breakfast available only in the hotel room and certainly with an additional charge Probably I would offer free coffee and croissants in the lobby if I would be the owner of that place
Positive_Review: Very nice room Welcoming staff

Negative_Review: Room rent plus breakfast charge is comparable to a lot of nice high end hotels
Positive_Review: Staff especially at reception was very good Location is superb All metros are 5 minute walk and you can go anywhere you want

Negative_Review: Don t have high expectations and the bathroom toiletry items wasn t stocked daily at all Another thing which wasn t usual to me that I had to pay them off for half of the stay
Positive_Review: The location was awesome and great value for the money

Negative_Review: A huge mismatch between the pictures on the website and the room we were given room no 301 The hotel should inform customers when they have half the hotel renovated and the remaining half is very old They should charge the rooms accordingly I wouldn t rate this hotel as a 4 No heating within the building Separate heater and cooler within the room Naturally the room was quite chilly when we arrived around 23 00 Very bad wifi connection The hotel needs urgent renovation
Positive_Review: Great staff very friendly Location is very good 2 minutes from Champs Elysees and the metro station

Negative_Review: No hot water the first 24h and some kind of alarm set off in the middle of the night The walls was paper thin and you could hear the noise from the street all night long
Positive_Review: Cosy and intake environment Helpful staff Good location

Negative_Review: They woke us up at night because there was some cleaning going on at 3 am Other than that there was nothing wrong Don t listen to negative reviews Just book it
Positive_Review: Location location location It is right at the center of Chaps Elysees Also the room was soo clean very beautiful newly renovated The breakfast was ok I loved it Also the stuff is very very kind They helped us a lot Thanks

Negative_Review: Noisy customers at night Bad noise insulation we can hear people talking in other rooms
Positive_Review: Very good location 2 min from champs elysees 1 min from arche du triomphe

Negative_Review: Pillows too hard shower was an after thought shower head could not be positioned to spray straight down the tub Thus the water bouncing off the shower wall ran down the length of the tub puddling strike that flowing into and on bathroom floor and then out into the room Quite the mess AC unit did not want to run for long periods DO NOT get suckered in to the breakfast thank goodness I read a review warning me of such 25 Euros for pastries wrapped in plastic Drink at your peril very expensive 6 or 7 Euros for a coke and 12 E for a mixed drink 7 Euros for a beer Ouch Also Hotel is being renovated Floors 4 6 But property is less than a block from Champs and just a couple hundred yards from subway access Oh and the Arch di Triumph is also close Great view PS Rooms definilty need refurbsihing
Positive_Review: Bed comfortable Staff friendly and very helpful

Negative_Review: No aircon at all in the whole of the hotel due to building works on 4th 5th and 6th floors and it was 36 degrees Not informed of this at time of booking or would not have stayed there Room was ovenlike but given a fan Dubious stains on walls lampshades and bathroom walls If windows were open it was super noisy the French like their horns even at 3 in the morning No tea and coffee making facilities Breakfast was very expensive 20 each every morning did not partake we ate out each day and it didn t cost 40 for brekkie
Positive_Review: The reception area was stunning very opulent Staff pleasant helpful and polite Bathroom quite nice Bed comfy Good location

Negative_Review: For 200 a night water in the minibar should be free A wall socket was broken quality of room I have seen better for cheaper You re basically just paying for location
Positive_Review: Friendly staff excellent location

Negative_Review: The hotel 4 star but must be 2 star because lot of mis in the room No free water No Coffe maker Internet very poor
Positive_Review: i love the hotel as location 1 min to champs eylees

Negative_Review: Nothing This was the best hotel I ve stayed at in Europe
Positive_Review: Service was wonderful lovely beds especially for a European hotel no nasty split in the middle and superb wellness centre

Negative_Review: first the bed broken and no maintance staff to repair I did repair with the hotel tools dated 31 12 2015 Second the rooms and the coredors was full on cigarets smoke Third the safe box battery is low we asked the staff to replce no respond
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: room cleanliness walls have stains carpet not clean around the corners after all the carpet is not clean very old carpet but the staff are saying they are under renovations but my room was great except what I said about the carpet and walls
Positive_Review: every things were great

Negative_Review: The room didn t have a central heating system and it got pretty cold at night A portable electric heater was provided but it was too small for the room The walls were stained and the curtains were old and ripped at some spots The furniture was also old and damaged
Positive_Review: The location was very convenient the subway station is just 2 blocks away to access any touristic spot in Paris

Negative_Review: My room was smaller than the one i booked but i arrived earlier than the check in time so i accepted what was offered although it should on the net the rooms was available I had the sign of request to clean my room Housekeeping ignored it
Positive_Review: Location and nice quiet room Nice staff

Negative_Review: The room was quite small small bed but cosy and nice We didn t like the staff so much they were not always acting professionally
Positive_Review: The location was perfect right next to Louis Vuitton store and next to the metro George V The hotel is also decorated in a nice barroque style

Negative_Review: Old Furniture Expensive food and bevarege No supermarket near hotel
Positive_Review: Location near champs and arc Wi fi free and fast Helpful staff I asked to print papers and they help me Near bus tour stations Neat RER station Taxi infornt of hotel

Negative_Review: Everything I have been traveling for the past 20 years this was the worst experience ever With all the respect to the staff who is trying to help as much as they can but the hotel condition is spoiling the whole fun
Positive_Review: Non

Positive_Review: The staff is very welcoming The location is excellent Literally 2 mins walk from Champs Elisee

Negative_Review: Very pricey but well we are near Champs lys es And the system of the shower very hard to understand we had to wait for the next morning for someone to come and explain how it worked Otherwise it s worth a short stay in the capital
Positive_Review: Helpful and friendly staff great location literally 2 minutes walking distance from place de l Etoile and Champs lys es very nice hotel typical from this area charming bedroom and renovated bathroom quiet area

Negative_Review: Price of the breakfast
Positive_Review: Very good location Reception very kind simpathetic and helpful Quiet room Keep orders and purchases with no fee Free internet in the room Definitively I ll return next time in Paris

Negative_Review: Hotel was being remodeled not told that they had no air conditioning dirt all over tried to give us a room with a temporary conditioner a 3x3ft box in the middle of the room dirty carpet We hit the stealing They found us a room in another one of their properties told us it was a 5star property called Hotel de Vigny It was late evening raining so we accepted it New hotel was old dirty carpet rickety elevator Good breakfast nice staff We cut our two week reservation short left after one week Bookings com should check out properties they promote
Positive_Review: Nothing really bad experience

Negative_Review: Truth and return my money back
